channel.title: Port-Fowarding Please Help
channel.description: [size=14pt]Problem: When I download a source / client I first go to Client.Java and change the old IP address to localhost 127.0.0.1 and login and check it out. Well, I found one I really liked and I changed it to my no-ip.com IP address and it will not connect. I have port-fowarded and everything else. I CAN login with 127.0.0.1 (localhost) but CANT with my no-ip.com IP address if you know were this problem is occuring at I am actually willing to pay 10$USD to the first person who decides to help and also if they'd like to play the server will be recieving admin. Thanks for your time! :D[/size]

item.title: Port-Fowarding Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Rocky2k10 Rocky2k10
item.description:
@Rocky2k10 wrote:

looks i will say again you (yourself) cannot log in onto your ip adress you have to use 127.0.0.1 any toher player that does not live in your house or is not using your internet must use your no-ip adress

Read full topic

item.title: Port-Fowarding Please Help
item.dc:creator: @julie101 julie101
item.description:
@julie101 wrote:

paymon:

i added u but i have to go atm but ill tell u wat to do quick if u still cant do ill do for u next time im on. just go on portforward.com choose ur router and runescape private servers and then click static ip address turtorial it will show u how to make 1=)

I went to portfoward.com but when i click one of the things like “wireless router” it takes me to a page were they sell them and shit lol. Get on msn real quick bro
